actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to authorize emergency guarantees of the bonds issued by the Municipal Assistance Corporation of the State of New York.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to guarantee individuals and financial institutions against loss from any bond issued by the Municipal Assistance Corporation of the State of New York. Limits the maximum amount of such guarantees which may be obligated in any one year to $5,000,000,000.

titles.title: A bill to authorize emergency guarantees of the bonds issued by the Municipal Assistance Corporation of the State of New York.
